original_text: As believers, we trust Christ to lead us into a new life after death. But if we only trust him to help us in this life, we should be very sad. Everybody should be very sorry for us, more than for anyone else.
korean_text: 만일 그리스도 안에서 우리가 바라는 것이 다만 이 세상의 삶뿐이면 모든 사람 가운데 우리가 더욱 불쌍한 자이리라

sentences.original_text: to lead us into a new life after death
sentences.korean_translation: 죽음 후 새로운 삶으로 우리를 이끌도록

sentences.original_text: But if we only trust him
to help us in this life
Everybody should be very sorry for us
sentences.korean_translation: 모두가 우리를 위해 매우 안타까워해야 합니다
